messages.text: Sir this is Kevin from Amazon Fraud Prevention Dept. We have detected a fraudulent purchase of an iPhone 16 on your account for ₹1,20,000. Did you authorize this purchase?
What? No! I didn't buy anything.
Okay sir, do not panic. This means your account has been compromised by hackers from China. We need to act immediately to cancel the order and secure your account.
Hackers? Oh my god. Yes, please cancel it.
To process the cancellation, I need you to fill out a secure refund form. Are you in front of your computer now?
Yes, I am.
Good. I need you to download a security software called AnyDesk. This will allow me to connect you to our secure server to fill the form. It is 100% safe.
AnyDesk? I've heard of that. It gives you control of my computer.
Sir, it is only to establish a secure connection. This is standard procedure for fraud cases. If we don't do this now, the money will be gone and we cannot help you. Do you want to lose ₹1,20,000?
No, of course not. Okay, I'm downloading it.
Okay sir, I am connected. Do not touch the mouse. I am opening the refund portal.
Okay sir, please type the refund amount in the box. Type '120000'.
Okay, done.
Oh no! Sir, there is a big problem. The server is showing you typed '1200000' instead of '120000'. Our system has accidentally refunded you ₹12 lakhs instead of ₹1.2 lakhs!
What?! That's impossible, I typed it correctly!
Sir, I can see the server log. This is a very serious error. This extra money is Amazon's, not yours. You must return it immediately or our legal team will file a police case against you for theft.
Police case? It was your system's fault!
Sir, I am trying to help you avoid legal trouble! If you cooperate, we can fix this. You need to send the extra amount back to our company's security account right now.
How do I do that?

The amount is ₹10,80,000. You must go to your bank now and do a wire transfer. I will give you the account details. Do not tell the bank it is a refund reversal, just say it is for a business purpose. We must be quick.
I don't have that much money.
Sir, check your account. The money is there. You must send it back NOW. I will stay on the line with you until you reach the bank. This is very urgent.
Sir, are you on your way to the bank? The fraud alert on your account will be permanent if the money is not returned in one hour.
I'm going.
Good. Do not disconnect.
